com.gh.bmd.jrt.time

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.time.Time
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimeDuration

    public class Time
extends Object
    Utility class for handling time in different time units.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 9/9/14.
